subject: Re: [junit] Theories and DataPoints
msgSnippet: Because the object is not instantiated before a valid method/datapoint combination is found, so the datapoints need to be available before object
messageBody:
Because the object is not instantiated before a valid method/datapoint
combination is found, so the datapoints need to be available before
object instantiation. Have you found a condition where this proves
problematic? Thanks,

David Saff

On Wed, Oct 14, 2009 at 5:07 PM, Raj <rajeshnair2k@...> wrote:
> Why is it mandatory that datapoint fields be static?
>
> -Rajesh
